info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: id
properties.description: Returns a value that uniquely identifies the table in a given workbook. The value of the identifier remains the same even when the table is renamed.

properties.name: showHeaders
properties.description: Indicates whether the header row is visible or not. This value can be set to show or remove the header row.

properties.name: showTotals
properties.description: Indicates whether the total row is visible or not. This value can be set to show or remove the total row.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Constant value that represents the Table style. Possible values are: TableStyleLight1 thru TableStyleLight21, TableStyleMedium1 thru TableStyleMedium28, TableStyleStyleDark1 thru TableStyleStyleDark11. A custom user-defined style present in the workbook can also be specified.

properties.name: columns
properties.description: Represents a collection of all the columns in the table.

properties.name: rows
properties.description: Represents a collection of all the rows in the table.

properties.name: worksheet
properties.description: The worksheet containing the current table.

properties.name: sort
properties.description: Represents the sorting for the table.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with the entire table.

methods.name: getHeaderRowRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with header row of the table.

methods.name: getDataBodyRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with the data body of the table.

methods.name: getTotalRowRange
methods.description: Gets the range object associated with totals row of the table.

methods.name: convertToRange
methods.description: Converts the table into a normal range of cells. All data is preserved.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Clears all the filters currently applied on the table.

methods.name: reapplyFilters
methods.description: Reapplies all the filters currently on the table.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
